--- select_literals_date.sql
SELECT
  DATE'2014-09-27',
  DATE('2014-09-27'),
  DATE r'2014-09-27',
  TIMESTAMP '2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08',
  TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles",
  TIMESTAMP'2014-09-27',
  TIMESTAMP('2014-09-27'),
  TIMESTAMP r'2014-09-27',
  DATE('2014-09-27') AS FOO,
  TIMESTAMP('2014-09-27') AS BAR

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.DateLiteral{
          pos:   9,
          end:   25,
          Value: "2014-09-27",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  47,
          Func: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  29,
            end:  33,
            Name: "DATE",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*parser.Arg{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:  34,
              Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
                pos:   34,
                end:   46,
                Value: "2014-09-27",
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.DateLiteral{
          pos:   51,
          end:   69,
          Value: "2014-09-27",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.TimestampLiteral{
          pos:   73,
          end:   110,
          Value: "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.TimestampLiteral{
          pos:   114,
          end:   168,
          Value: "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.TimestampLiteral{
          pos:   172,
          end:   193,
          Value: "2014-09-27",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  220,
          Func: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  197,
            end:  206,
            Name: "TIMESTAMP",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*parser.Arg{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:  207,
              Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
                pos:   207,
                end:   219,
                Value: "2014-09-27",
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.TimestampLiteral{
          pos:   224,
          end:   247,
          Value: "2014-09-27",
        },
      },
      &parser.Alias{
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  269,
          Func: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  251,
            end:  255,
            Name: "DATE",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*parser.Arg{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:  256,
              Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
                pos:   256,
                end:   268,
                Value: "2014-09-27",
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
        As: &parser.AsAlias{
          pos:   270,
          Alias: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  273,
            end:  276,
            Name: "FOO",
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.Alias{
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  303,
          Func: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  280,
            end:  289,
            Name: "TIMESTAMP",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*parser.Arg{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:  290,
              Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
                pos:   290,
                end:   302,
                Value: "2014-09-27",
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
        As: &parser.AsAlias{
          pos:   304,
          Alias: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  307,
            end:  310,
            Name: "BAR",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*parser.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT DATE "2014-09-27", DATE("2014-09-27"), DATE "2014-09-27", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27", TIMESTAMP("2014-09-27"), TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27", DATE("2014-09-27") AS FOO, TIMESTAMP("2014-09-27") AS BAR
